title: Bug 102623: Image is not refreshed after reimporting
OB: Image is not being refreshed after reimporting. The original image continues to be displayed.
EB: The image should be refreshed and the new imported image should be displayed.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout. 2. Verify that the new image is not displayed and the original image is still being shown.
